name: Put That Thing Back
description:
Put That Thing Back!

You as the player/s are the subjects of a game show. You are located within an arena and are pitted against each other in a king of the hill game type. Between each other, you must try to capture the weapon located within the arena or force the other player to die to environmental hazards (i.e. spikes, pitfalls). 

To win, out-maneuver your opponent to take them out first to secure your own victory, whether with a weapon or by pushing your opponent to their death.
